{\n \"ingredient\": \"chicken\"\n}.response: {"name":"Creamy Tuscan Chicken","ingredients":["1 lb chicken breast, thinly sliced","1/4 cup all-purpose flour","2 tablespoons olive oil","1/4 teaspoon salt","1/4 teaspoon black pepper","1 garlic clove, minced","1/2 cup chicken broth","1/3 cup heavy cream","1/4 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped","1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, grated","1/4 teaspoon dried thyme"],"instructions":["1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees.","2. In a shallow dish, combine flour, salt and pepper. Dredge chicken in the flour mixture.","3. In a large skillet over medium-high heat, heat olive oil. Add chicken and cook until browned, about 3 minutes per side.","4. Add garlic, chicken broth, heavy cream, sun-dried tomatoes, Parmesan cheese and thyme to the skillet. Stir until well combined.","5. Bring the sauce to a simmer and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until slightly thickened.","6. Transfer the chicken and sauce to a baking dish and bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through."]}

{'ingredient': 'chicken'}.response: {'name': 'Chicken Teriyaki', 'ingredients': ['-1 lb chicken breast, cut into small strips', '-2 tbsp soy sauce', '-1 tbsp honey', '-1 tbsp vegetable oil', '-1 garlic clove, minced', '-1/2 tsp ground ginger', '-3 green onions, thinly sliced'], 'instructions': ['1. In a large resealable bag, combine chicken strips, soy sauce, honey, vegetable oil, garlic, and ginger. Seal bag and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours.', '2. Preheat grill to medium-high heat.', '3. Grill chicken strips for 5-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through.', '4. Garnish with green onion slices and serve with steamed rice.']}
